item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Monday, January 27, 2025 at 6:20 PM UTC
item.description:

2. Operation Leg: When the RAF airdropped a prosthetic leg into a German POW castle (114 points | 42 comments)

24. Using generative AI as part of historical research: three case studies (235 points | 196 comments)
25. Qwen2.5-1M: Deploy your own Qwen with context length up to 1M tokens (279 points | 96 comments)

27. The impact of competition and DeepSeek on Nvidia (446 points | 253 comments)
